token.name: Force Token Nameplate
token.hint: When showing a creature's name, should the module forces the display of its token nameplate.

rolls.name: Hide Rolls Details
rolls.hint: This will remove the roll details (formula, dice values, etc.) from the chat messages.

criticals.name: Hide Criticals
criticals.hint: Should criticals and fumbles be hidden from the players. The 'Hide Rolls Details' setting must be enabled.

cardContent.name: Hide Card Content
cardContent.hint: This will completely hide the descriptions in cards.

footer.name: Hide Footers
footer.hint: This will hide the card footer displaying actions details.

traits.name: (PF2e) Hide Traits
traits.hint: This will remove the actions trait tags present in chat messages. If 'Rolls Only' is selected, the 'Hide Rolls Details' setting must be enabled.

namesMenu.name: Custom Names
namesMenu.label: Setup Names
namesMenu.hint: Set per actor type names, the types are generated by the system.

pf2e.disabled: The system setting '{setting}' has been disabled to avoid conflicts with the module '{module}'.
